name: Tagbox – UGC Galleries, Social Media Widgets, User Reviews & Analytics
author: Tagbox

sections.installation:
1. Go to your WordPress dashboard.
  2. Find the “Plugins” menu in the left sidebar.
  3. Click on “Add new”.
  4. Search for “Taggbox”
  5. Now install the plugin by clicking on Install Now.
  6. Press on Activate to activate the plugin.
  7. Login or Signup for a Tagbox account.
sections.faq:
Requirements

Your website or WordPress blog must be using WordPress.org version 3.7 or higher. We highly recommend using the latest WordPress 6.1 version.
Apart from this, you must have admin access to install plugins. If you need help, you can forward instructions and request admin access.

What does Tagbox WordPress Plugin do?

Tagbox WordPress plugin facilitates codeless and seamless integration with your WordPress website.

What is Tagbox?

Tagbox is the ultimate UGC platform for marketers and business owners. We help you effectively use the power of UGC to bring the human touch to your marketing.

How do I create a social media feed with Tagbox?

Login to your Tagbox account, add feeds, connect with your source platform, choose the preferred connection type (like hashtags, profile, mentions, etc.), and enter the credentials required. Finally, click on the “Create feed” button. You will be moved to the moderation and customization window.

Who should use Tagbox?

Tagbox is perfect for agencies, business owners, small businesses, bloggers, designers, or anyone with a WordPress website who wants to use a seamless plugin with built-in marketing tools. Any B2B, B2C, or D2C organizations are welcome to use Tagbox per their requirements and use cases.

Can I use Tagbox for free?

Yes, you can opt for the 14 Day Free trial or go for our FREE Startup plan that can integrate with three platforms (Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter only).

Are coding skills required to use Tagbox WordPress plugin?

Using the Tagbox WordPress plugin requires no coding skills as we work with Shortcodes instead of complex old-school codes.

Is Tagbox compatible with Elementor and Woocommerce platforms?

Yes, Tagbox is compatible with all CMS platforms including Elementor and Woocommerce.
sections.description:
Tagbox is a leading UGC platform, and social media aggregator that facilitates collecting and embedding social media and other UGC feeds from 20+ platforms on the website including Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Pinterest, RSS, and more. Each Tagbox segment alone is robust enough to help you accomplish the desired goal and, when combined together, can do wonders for your marketing efforts.

Moreover, you can also create and embed reviews on your website from third-party sites like Google, Yelp, Airbnb, and Facebook. With Tagbox Widget, you get numerous features like customization, moderation, UGC Uploader, real-time updates, insightful analytics, tag-based widgets, and much more.

Apart from all this, we have API integrations with all social networks to help you repurpose your beautifully curated feeds wherever your audience lies without any restrictions

Use Tagbox to –

  • 🚀 Deliver only top-notch social content on your website using our moderation feature and profanity filter.
  • 💬 Get the benefit of integrating all your UGC from multiple networks into a unified platform for effective campaigns.
  • 📊 Automate your entire content collection process and enjoy the benefits of user-generated content (UGC) with ease.
  • 👨‍💻 Get a Litecode/shortcode instead of heavy and lengthy traditional codes that might affect your core web vitals.
  • 🔗 Integrate diverse content seamlessly into a dynamic dashboard.
  • 📈 Use analytics features and get detailed insights about user behavior to build customer-centric campaigns in the future.

Ready to get started? click Download in the top right corner of the page.

Or

⏩ Start Your 14 Days Free Trial – https://bit.ly/3saKyFM

Social Media & Reviews Aggregation Platform

The primary goal of social media and reviews aggregation platform is to give customer sentiments with the help of collecting reviews, ratings, comments, and other UGC from diverse sources like social media like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, RSS, and LinkedIn, review sites like Yelp, Google Reviews, and Airbnb, etc.

Users can access these platforms to read reviews and comments about businesses and share their opinions. These platforms can aggregate all content into a single frame, making it easy for users to stay up-to-date on the latest views and experiences related to the products or services they are interested in.

Businesses can also use social media and review aggregation platforms to monitor and manage their online reputation by tracking customer feedback and responding to reviews and comments from a central dashboard. This can help businesses stay informed about customer sentiment and address issues before they escalate.

Overall, reviews and social media aggregation platforms provide a valuable service by collecting and presenting customer feedback in a comprehensive and accessible way. They are helpful for both consumers and businesses alike.

Tagbox is an aggregator platform that can easily collect content from any social media or review platform. All you need to do is choose your connection type and input the credentials.

With Tagbox, you don’t need to collect content from social media one by one or embed them manually anymore. Using powerful automation frameworks, all your collection and embedding requirements can be done with a single click.

Use cases that depict a clear picture of how businesses can benefit from Tagbox:

✅ Website widgets
✅ Email campaigns
✅ Hashtag campaigns
✅ UGC Galleries
✅ Social Ads
✅ Print Media
✅ Shoppable Galleries
✅ Tag-based widget

Visit Tagbox for more information.

PLUGIN FEATURES

  • Gather content (also UGC) from over 20+ social media and digital platforms.
  • Customize your feeds with beautiful fonts, layouts, designs, styles, colors, and more.
  • (Automatic) Content moderation for your feed to maintain premium content quality
  • Add compelling CTA buttons to social posts on your web pages and urge your users to take desired actions.
  • Automatic real-time content updates from social media & digital platforms.
  • Fast and responsive plugin.
  • Add custom posts & even modify feeds with custom CSS.
  • Easy integration with no complex structure or expertise requirement.
  • In-built analytics to measure the performance of your website widget.
  • Create photo galleries or video galleries with a wide variety of themes available.
  • Global active customer support and assistance.
  • UGC Rights management to get rights from multiple content owners in one go.
  • UGC Uploader, Feature that gives your users access to upload their photos/videos/testimonials without leaving the website.
  • Tagbox gives API access to businesses that wish to integrate user-generated content on their apps and other software.

INTEGRATIONS

  • WordPress – Create a social media feed widget with Tagbox and connect your WordPress site to elevate your website’s performance.
  • HTML – Create a social media feed widget with Tagbox and connect your HTML site to elevate your website’s performance.
  • Wix – Create a social media feed widget with Tagbox and connect your Wix site to elevate your website’s performance.
  • Squarespace – Create a social media feed widget with Tagbox and connect your Squarespace site to elevate your website’s performance.
  • Shopify – Create a social media feed widget with Tagbox and connect your Shopify Store to elevate your website’s performance.
  • Mailchimp – Create your next email campaign with Tagbox, and connect your Mailchimp account to run it effectively.
  • Hubspot – Create your next email campaign with Tagbox, and connect your Hubspot account to run it effectively.
  • Klaviyo – Create your next email campaign with Tagbox, and connect your Klaviyo account to run it effectively.
  • Omnisend – Create your next email campaign with Tagbox, and connect your Omnisend account to run it effectively.

-Embed Social Media Feeds-
Create amazing social feeds for your website from social media platforms such as Instagram, Tumblr, Twitter, Facebook, Linkedin, etc. →
Request Demo [|] Start Free Trial →

-Embed Customer Reviews Feeds-
Create trustworthy & authentic reviews feed widget for websites by curating valuable customer reviews from Airbnb, Google reviews, Facebook reviews, Yelp, etc.
Request Demo [|] Start Free Trial →

-Embed Video Feeds-
Create engaging and exciting video feeds using content from platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Vimeo, Flickr, etc.
Request Demo [|] Start Free Trial →

HOW TO GET A SHORTCODE

  • Register or Log in to the Tagbox Widget plugin.
  • Once you log in, you will see your existing feeds, or else you can start creating your feeds by clicking on the +Create Widget button.
  • Just click on the “Copy” button to copy your Shortcode under any of your created feeds.
  • Embed it on the page or post where you want to display the feed(s)

SUPPORT

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@taggbox.com.

PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS OF SERVICE

  • Privacy Policy
  • Terms of Service
sections.reviews:
The Taggbox WordPress plugin is highly versatile.

By sammuller on February 21, 2023

The Taggbox WordPress plugin is highly versatile. I came across this plugin and wanted to give it a try for creating UGC galleries. But with more hands-on experience with their services, it felt like using them more and more. Their features and solutions are very easy to use and compatible with any business type. I created UGC galleries for my website within minutes and they turned out to be breathtaking. Thank you Taggbox plugin for your timely and prompt support.

Great utility for UGC

By nakulsingh on January 9, 2023

I love Taggbox and how it helps gather UGC from all social media and reviews platforms and create beautiful widgets out of them. It gives so many options to personalize the widget and create exceptionally attractive user-generated content galleries for the website. Taggbox has helped me as the time I was using it to track the performance of my content on various social media platforms. It was the best experience for my business. The dashboard is neat and user-friendly, you can easily set it up and navigate. I recommend this to any business.
